org.agent.slang.out.bml.marc

Class MarcBMLTranslationComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • LivingComponent
      • org.agent.slang.out.bml.marc.MarcBMLTranslationComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, MarcSocket.DataListener

    public class MarcBMLTranslationComponent
extends LivingComponent
implements MarcSocket.DataListener
    Provides final BML and EML messages and sends them to MARC toolkit for behavior representation. OS Compatibility: Windows and Linux
    Version:
    1, 10/19/13 2, 17/11/2016 - Customize Audio Path and adding the ability of playing user defined audio files plus machine generated voices, Sahba ZOJAJI
    Author:
    Ovidiu Serban, ovidiu@roboslang.org, sahba ZOJAJI, sahba.zojaji@insa-rouen.fr
